definitions.definition: To make someone a cripple; to cause someone to become physically impaired.
examples: The car bomb crippled five passers-by.
My ambitions were crippled by a lack of money.

definitions.definition: To cause severe and disabling damage; to make unable to function normally.
To release a product (especially a computer program ) with reduced functionality, in some cases, making the item essentially worthless.
examples: The word processor was released in a crippled demonstration version that did not allow you to save.

definitions.definition: To nerf something to the point of being underpowered.

main_definition: To make someone a cripple; to cause someone to become physically impaired.
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) To damage seriously ; to destroy .
( figuratively ) To cause severe and disabling damage; to make unable to function normally.
To release a product (especially a computer program ) with reduced functionality, in some cases, making the item essentially worthless.
( slang , video games ) To nerf something to the point of being underpowered.
